membership.contestantName: CD Universidad San Martín de Porres

messages:
Name: Christian Cueva
Nationality: Peru
Date of Birth: November 23, 1991
Position: Midfielder
Current club: Al Fateh
Pro League clubs played for: Al Fateh

Christian Cueva is an Al Fateh midfielder who has played in 15 Pro League games in 2020/2021 since joining the club on 28th January 2021, being selected in the starting XI in 11 of these and being used as a substitute on four occasions.

Cueva last played in the league on May 30 for Al Fateh versus Al Raed. In that game he scored and assisted another for his team in their 2-2 draw. In fact, he has currently netted in three successive Pro League appearances. The midfielder has scored eight Pro League goals this campaign,, whilst he also ranks joint sixth for Pro League assists this season having set up seven goals for his team-mates. He has been booked twice.
A first goal of the league campaign for Cueva came against Al Shabab in a 2-1 victory on February 17.
In last season's Liga MX, Cueva played in two games for Pachuca.
Before linking up with Al Fateh in January 2021, Cueva made 15 league appearances in total at Krasnodar.
